about_the_game:
STORY


"Furry VTuber" s a story about a guy who met his favorite VTuber "RainbowAstra" in real life, who turns out to be a simple 23-year-old girl named Anna. However, she's completely different from her avatar - sarcastic, pessimistic, depressed and anxious, the only thing that's similar is her voice.
Still, they seem to get along and start to spend time together, develop felling to each other, then suddenly something strange happens - her VTuber avatar becomes a real person.

Now, together with our main hero, she has to decide whether to let it be "real" or get it back into virtual world, resolve her personal problems and finally understand which part of her character is her true "self".

FEATURES:
• Short but fun little visual novel
• Cute VTuber!
• HD fully original artworks.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
• Some personal drama

name: Furry VTuber 🎭

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM

short_description: When the stream is over and nobody's watching her - she can finally be herself and act normally without her "VTuber" mask. But what if her virtual personality was real, would she get along with it?
